oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Lt. Col. Peril Columbus Haynes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Lt. Col. Peril Columbus Haynes of the 4th Tenn. Cav., CSA. This was Starnes-McLemore's regiment. Haynes was from Chapel Hill, Marshall County, Tenn. He was wounded Feb. 3, 1863, at Fort Donelson. He was shot in the head but lived to be 81 years old. Haynes was also a veteran of the Mexican War (1846-1847).
